title: The Day - East Lyme finance board approves proposed 2022-23 budget - News from southeastern Connecticut - theday.com
content: The Day - East Lyme finance board approves proposed 2022-23 budget - News from southeastern Connecticut  theday.com
description: East Lyme — The Board of Finance voted Wednesday to approve a proposed town and school budget for 2022-2023 of $80.6
